text:
AUSTRALIAN OPEN
		  
		  January 19, 2013
		  
		  Jo-Wilfried Tsonga
		  MELBOURNE, VICTORIA
		  J. TSONGA/B. Kavcic
  6‑2, 6‑1, 6‑4

THE MODERATOR:  Questions, please. 

Q.  You said after your last match you weren't too happy with your attitude and performance.  How do you feel after today's game?
JO WILFRIED TSONGA:  Yeah, I played a better match.  I mean, was not easy because it was really windy today and not easy to feel the ball really well.  So I'm happy to go through this one in three sets. 
Yeah, I look forward for the next match. 

FastScripts Transcript by ASAP Sports

interview.question: You said after your last match you weren't too happy with your attitude and performance. How do you feel after today's game?
interview.answer: Yeah, I played a better match. I mean, was not easy because it was really windy today and not easy to feel the ball really well. So I'm happy to go through this one in three sets. Yeah, I look forward for the next match.
